name: HoloFuel
description: Simple and intuitive interface allowing users to transact with HoloFuel.

scripts.start-dna-agent2: cd ./holofuel && HC_N3H_BOOTSTRAP_NODE=wss://192.168.0.7:38821/?a=hkYlk03WzX-pK3rAdj_fWeXC5UpKVwsPzUetrRHh1WiJefYe7yYlk7QD_B1_MOjIribJgnMX3eHYEcJUUWpZG_FdhgMP5snU HC_N3H_IPC_URI=wss://127.0.0.1:36305/ HC_N3H_PATH=/home/lisa/n3h HC_AGENT=testAgent2 hc run --port 3100
